title: Prepare Exhibits for a Motion
description: A paralegal needs to prepare and organize the exhibits that will be filed in support of a motion.

tasks.description: Receive a list of documents from the attorney that will be used as exhibits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the list of documents to be prepared.

tasks.description: For each document, create an exhibit cover page and label it sequentially (Exhibit A, Exhibit B, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates properly labeled exhibit pages.

tasks.description: Combine each exhibit cover page with its corresponding document into a single PDF file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a separate, correctly formatted PDF for each exhibit.

tasks.description: Create an index of all exhibits to be filed with the motion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a final exhibit index.
